statements: SELECT * FROM student_engagement;
SELECT student_id, engagement_score FROM student_engagement WHERE materials_viewed > 10;
SELECT course_id, assignments_completed FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE course_id = 101 AND materials_viewed > 5;
SELECT student_id, engagement_score, materials_viewed FROM student_engagement ORDER BY materials_viewed DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_engagement WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, engagement_score FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, materials_viewed FROM student_engagement ORDER BY materials_viewed DESC;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_engagement;
SELECT student_id, assignments_completed FROM student_engagement WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'book' ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE engagement_score < 50;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score), AVG(engagement_score) FROM students;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Book';
SELECT student_id, engagement_score FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students, CourseMaterials WHERE Students.student_id = CourseMaterials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN EngagementMetrics ON Students.student_id = EngagementMetrics.student_id WHERE Students.student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM Students JOIN EngagementMetrics ON Students.student_id = EngagementMetrics.student_id WHERE engagement_score > 80;

SELECT Students.student_name, CourseMaterials.material_name FROM Students JOIN EngagementMetrics ON Students.student_id = EngagementMetrics.student_id JOIN CourseMaterials ON EngagementMetrics.material_id = CourseMaterials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM EngagementMetrics GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM courses WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM materials WHERE type = 'video';
SELECT student_name, engagement_date, duration_minutes FROM students JOIN engagement_logs ON students.student_id = engagement_logs.student_id;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM students
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses
SELECT material_name, type, content FROM materials
SELECT student_name, course_name, engagement_date FROM students JOIN engagement_logs ON students.student_id = engagement_logs.student_id
SELECT material_name, course_name, engagement_date FROM materials JOIN engagement_logs ON materials.material_id = engagement_logs.material_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM Students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, engagement_date FROM Engagements WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT improvement_description FROM AreasForImprovement WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, engagement_score FROM Students WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, course_id FROM Materials WHERE material_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT student_name, SUM(engagement_score) AS total_score FROM Students GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_score > 50;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM Courses INNER JOIN AreasForImprovement ON Courses.course_id = AreasForImprovement.course_id;
